channel.title: Loyalty titles while talking? [PI] Help me assholes I help you guys all the time
channel.description:
So I have added loyalty titles to my server, I didn't include all of them nor did i follow any tuts :|
I'm trying to figure out how to add it so the loyalty title appears in the chat box as well as when a player yells.
Any tips? A tad lost on this part as I suck at client sided work :)
My guess was it has something to do with @cr2@ but I have no idea :P

item.title: Loyalty titles while talking? [PI] Help me assholes I help you guys all the time

item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

thank you! I saw Something about a username for method189 so i was searching that :3
edit: except I can’t find method170 anywhere >.<

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

kickingjamie:

If you can’t do something thats already been done why don’t you just look at a tutorial, I’m sure that will give you ideas.

I have been looking for the chatbox and yell command, right now im trying “+loyaltyRank+”"
I haven’t seen any tuts on it for PI just 562’s :3

edit: @ fridder, I was just about to. :3

Read full topic

item.title: Loyalty titles while talking? [PI] Help me assholes I help you guys all the time
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“Wet Dreamss, post:3, topic:427950”][quote author=JavaTC link=topic=530639.msg3875299#msg3875299 date=1325631286]
I don’ do client sided but you could look for where the crowns are handled and rip that or something of the sort.
[/quote]
Thats what I was trying to do :3

I couldn’t find the Misc optimized text or anything near it, pushmessage seemed like it might be, but i don’t wanna fuck with it too much[/quote]

Back up all files your fucking with and then try.

Read full topic
